Quote.Author: James Dickey
Quote.QuoteValue: I want a fever, in poetry: a fever, and tranquillity

Quote.Author: James Galway
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not consider my self as having mastered the flute, but I get a real kick out of trying

Quote.Author: Jamie Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: All I can do is put on my armor and brace for the arrows

Quote.Author: Jayne Meadows
Quote.QuoteValue: I just loved and love life. I love it today

Quote.Author: Jeff Lynne
Quote.QuoteValue: Old music is the same as new music - it's just a different way of delivering it

Quote.Author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Shrek is not like anything anybody has ever seen before

Quote.Author: Jeremy Sumpter
Quote.QuoteValue: San Francisco. The one team that everyone in LA hates

Quote.Author: Jerry Kramer
Quote.QuoteValue: College was especially sweet because of the positive, hopeful atmosphere of a college campus

Quote.Author: Jerry Stiller
Quote.QuoteValue: Creative comedy is like growing geraniums in a mine field

Quote.Author: Jessi Colter
Quote.QuoteValue: If I stopped writing and being at my piano, I wouldn't know how to live. It's your best friend

Quote.Author: Kailash Satyarthi
Quote.QuoteValue: Childhood means simplicity. Look at the world with the child's eye - it is very beautiful

Quote.Author: Kaley Cuoco
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the fashion world. I love clothes. I love style

Quote.Author: Kalpana Chawla
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been very determined. I don't get easily discouraged

Quote.QuoteValue: I was raised to be an independent woman, not the victim of anything

Quote.Author: Kangana Ranaut
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom of being alone is intoxicating

Quote.Author: Kapil Dev
Quote.QuoteValue: Apart from education, you need good health, and for that, you need to play sports

Quote.Author: Kapil Sibal
Quote.QuoteValue: Intolerance is alien to Hinduism

Quote.Author: Kara Swisher
Quote.QuoteValue: As I always like to keep in mind about everything: Don't fight the trend

Quote.Author: Karan Johar
Quote.QuoteValue: Two powerful people can't be friends

Quote.QuoteValue: There's a hustling, but also a self-centred vibe you can get from people in Delhi

Quote.QuoteValue: abbar - You can't win unless you learn how to lose

Quote.Author: Karen Elson
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a diary full of lyrics and whatnot and a little voice recorder of guitar riffs

Quote.Author: Karin Slaughter
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been drawn to historical fiction

Quote.Author: Karl Barth
Quote.QuoteValue: Joy is the simplest form of gratitude

Quote.QuoteValue: Education is a crutch with which the foolish attack the wise to prove that they are not idiots

Quote.Author: Karl Malone
Quote.QuoteValue: You work for whatever you get in life

Quote.Author: Karl Rove
Quote.QuoteValue: Memo to White House: Calling voters stupid is not a winning strategy

Quote.Author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Irony is the form of paradox. Paradox is what is good and great at the same time

Quote.Author: Karlie Kloss
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that taking ballet is one of the best things a girl can do. Period

Quote.Author: Kary Mullis
Quote.QuoteValue: Science grows like a weed every year

Quote.Author: Kat Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: My first show was in front of 30,000 people with will.i.am, and I wasn't even that nervous

Quote.Author: Katarina Johnso
Quote.QuoteValue: hompson - I played a lot of football, and I was a goalkeeper, but I didn't really like playing in goal

Quote.Author: Kate Beckinsale
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to say, sushi freaks me out more than almost anything

Quote.QuoteValue: No individual, regardless of where they live or whom they love, should suffer discrimination

Quote.Author: Kate Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I think quotes are very dangerous things

Quote.Author: Kate Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been an outward rebel, but inside, I just rebel deeply

Quote.Author: Kate Hudson
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty will never break you

Quote.Author: Kate McKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting recognized on the street is fine, but I never really wanted to be famous

Quote.Author: Kate Middleton
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if I have a favorite color

Quote.Author: Kate Moss
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing tastes as good as skinny feels

Quote.Author: Kate Upton
Quote.QuoteValue: My dream was always to be on the cover of 'Sports Illustrated.'

Quote.Author: Kate Winslet
Quote.QuoteValue: I think heartbreak is something that you learn to live with as opposed to learn to forget

Quote.Author: Katee Sackhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: It's weird to me to see how different everyone's opinion of beauty is

Quote.Author: Katey Sagal
Quote.QuoteValue: There isn't a lot written about the motorcycle culture

Quote.Author: Katharine Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is hard. After all, it kills you

Quote.Author: Katherine Dunn
Quote.QuoteValue: Every doorway, every intersection has a story

Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the most uncoordinated clumsy, klutzy person. I always had a bruise, I always tripped and fell

Quote.QuoteValue: When I dance, I forget everything else and just feel completely happy

Quote.QuoteValue: The RSC changed my career, and 'Coronation Street' changed my life

Quote.QuoteValue: There's just as many different kinds of feminism as there are women in the world

Quote.Author: Kathleen Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: The older I get, the less I suffer fools gladly

Quote.QuoteValue: I thrive on production. It feels very much like a natural environment for me

Quote.QuoteValue: If you see me on Friday, you'll see different material on Saturday night

Quote.QuoteValue: I always knew I belonged on the other side of the lens

Quote.Author: Katie Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to thank everyone for all their support and prayers. I'm so humbled by that

Quote.QuoteValue: Dance has been a big passion for me

Quote.Author: Katy Perry
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a good girl because I really believe in love, integrity, and respect

Quote.Author: Kawhi Leonard

Quote.QuoteValue: My dad was a workaholic. I saw him work seven days a week

Quote.QuoteValue: Moods are complicated and very much a part of who we are. People would be very boring without them

Quote.Author: Kazuo Ishiguro

Quote.Author: Keith Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: Progressive economic policies lead to a sustainable economy

Quote.Author: Keke Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I never try to be too sexy. People know when you're not comfortable and trying to be sexy

Quote.Author: Kellan Lutz
Quote.QuoteValue: I love life way too much and find fun in almost anything. I'm a chameleon

Quote.QuoteValue: God will never give you anything you can't handle, so don't stress

Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a prettier everywoman. I am an everywoman that they clean up awfully well for T.V

Quote.QuoteValue: I love history... everything is inspired by history, so that's why I love vintage and antiques

Quote.Author: Kellyanne Conway
Quote.QuoteValue: Women in my focus groups, they say a bald man is trustworthy. He has nothing to hide

Quote.Author: Kelsea Ballerini
Quote.QuoteValue: There's value in being a normal person

Quote.Author: Ken Cuccinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to make me speechless

Quote.Author: Ken Follett
Quote.QuoteValue: A very good editor is almost a collaborator

Quote.QuoteValue: It was my wife that insisted I do 'The Hangover.'

Quote.QuoteValue: Fascism wants Baptism coast to coast

Quote.QuoteValue: Polling in a general election is pretty accurate, because turnout is usually high

Quote.Author: Ken Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: In college, before video games, we would amuse ourselves by posing programming exercises

Quote.Author: Kendall Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: My ideal prom date would have to be cute, funny, sweet, nice

Quote.Author: Kendra Wilkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: The best date would have to be at a sporting event - it will show the guy what type of girl she is

Quote.QuoteValue: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things

Quote.Author: Kenneth Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: The stock market is a discounter of all known information

Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest single challenge to America and our future is income inequality. We've got to fix it

Quote.Author: Kenneth Lay
Quote.QuoteValue: Our liquidity is fine. As a matter of fact, it's better than fine. It's strong

Quote.Author: Kenny Chesney
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there is a part of life that I'm missing

Quote.Author: Kenny G
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned that you simply can't control those bad vibes

Quote.QuoteValue: You gotta know when to hold 'em, know when to fold 'em, know when to walk away, know when to run

Quote.Author: Kerri Walsh Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom is a constant in my life in so many ways

Quote.Author: Kerry King
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a new perspective where I got a role in and they are just spewed out of my mouth

Quote.Author: Kerry Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: You may not be thinking about politics, but politics is thinking about you

Quote.Author: Kesha
Quote.QuoteValue: Glitter is my makeup of choice

Quote.Author: Kevin Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: Before Footloose, the things I'd done weren't cute. In Diner I was an alcoholic

Quote.Author: Kevin Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe me, I've taken a lot of heat for my mustache

Quote.Author: Kevin Costner
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a celebrity is probably the closest to being a beautiful woman as you can get

Quote.Author: Kevin Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: I look at my jersey and see the NBA logo, I'm like, 'I didn't think I'd be here.'

Quote.QuoteValue: I learned one thing - never hate a positive option

Quote.QuoteValue: When you stand for something, you've got to stand for it all the way, not half way

Quote.Author: Kevin Kwan
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the dreams on my wish list is to spend more time in Thailand

Quote.Author: Kevin McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: My belief is you have one chance to make a first impression

Quote.Author: Kevin McCloud
Quote.QuoteValue: I cannot look at modern buildings without thinking of historical ones

Quote.Author: Kevin Mitnick
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day, my goal was to be the best hacker

Quote.Author: Kevin O'Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want a friend, buy a dog

Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone is into male grooming

Quote.Author: Kevin Plank
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe people change. I think that they can learn from mistakes

Quote.Author: Kevin Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Dudes know I'm not a threat. Chicks know I'm not a threat

Quote.Author: Kevin Systrom
Quote.QuoteValue: It's funny: I was a photographer before I was a programmer

Quote.Author: Kevyn Aucoin
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfection is boring. If a face doesn't have mistakes, it's nothing

Quote.Author: Khaled Hosseini
Quote.QuoteValue: People find meaning and redemption in the most unusual human connections

Quote.Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: Fitness is not about being better than someone else... It's about being better than you used to be

Quote.Author: Kid Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: Detroit: Cars and rock 'n' roll. Not a bad combo

Quote.Author: Kim Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: Canada is the homeland of equality, justice and tolerance

Quote.QuoteValue: Really rejoice in being yourself. Have your own drumbeat

Quote.Author: Kim Gordon
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone becomes mannered if you think too much about what other people think

Quote.QuoteValue: Our family are all very hard working

Quote.Author: Kimora Lee Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: My family is the most important thing to me

Quote.Author: Kinky Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail

Quote.Author: Kirby Smart
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very important that we don't make the same mistakes twice. That's a big part of improvement

Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that freedom of speech and freedom of religion go hand-in-hand in America

Quote.QuoteValue: Love has more depth as you get older

Quote.Author: Kirk Hammett
Quote.QuoteValue: My guitars are my umbilical cord. They're directly wired into my head

Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very mature for my age, but I'm also innocent in a lot of ways

Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe you have to have eating disorders and mental illness to screw up

Quote.QuoteValue: One should judge a man mainly from his depravities. Virtues can be faked. Depravities are real

Quote.QuoteValue: I'm getting sick and tired of doing anything half-way

Quote.Author: Kodi Smi
Quote.QuoteValue: cPhee - When I know I'm not doing any auditions, I go to the skate park on my scooter or my bike

Quote.QuoteValue: I'm proof that, even after having a baby, you can look better and sexier than ever!

Quote.Author: Kris Kristofferson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't get out of something, get into it

Quote.Author: Kristen Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I am quite shy and people think I'm aloof

Quote.Author: Kristen Wiig
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the rain. It's my favorite weather

Quote.QuoteValue: In all honesty, when you talk about 'the gay community,' you are talking about my community, haha

Quote.QuoteValue: I would never put my close friends or a real relationship on a show

Quote.QuoteValue: Apples, grapes... any kind of fruit gives me the energy I need to get through my busy day

Quote.Author: Kristin Gore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just grateful that my parents still love each other

Quote.Author: Kristin Scott Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I find it difficult to explain, but I'm quite ashamed of being an actress

Quote.QuoteValue: We are all somewhere or the other a little grey, not black and white. We have our imperfections

Quote.Author: Kumail Nanjiani
Quote.QuoteValue: I stay home. It's the best place to be alone. There is hardly any walk-through traffic

Quote.Author: Kygo
Quote.QuoteValue: I just like playing songs with happy vibes and good feelings

Quote.QuoteValue: I take, like, 500 selfies to get one I like

Quote.QuoteValue: I do quite naughty things now. I do like to be a bit sexy

Quote.Author: Kyrie Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the gym; I love basketball. I'm really passionate about it

Quote.QuoteValue: Luxury is a state of mind

Quote.Author: L. Neil Smith

Quote.Author: Lady Gaga
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether I'm wearing lots of makeup or no makeup, I'm always the same person inside

Quote.Author: Laila Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: Authenticity is very important - be true to one's self

Quote.QuoteValue: Now that I am a deputy, I will cease to be an agitator

Quote.Author: Lana Turner
Quote.QuoteValue: A gentleman is simply a patient wolf

Quote.Author: Lance Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: If you worried about falling off the bike, you'd never get on

Quote.Author: Langston Hughes
Quote.QuoteValue: Like a welcome summer rain, humor may suddenly cleanse and cool the earth, the air and you

Quote.Author: Lara Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I think of dieting, then I eat pizza

Quote.Author: Larry Bird
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't matter who scores the points, it's who can get the ball to the scorer

Quote.Author: Larry Ellison

Quote.QuoteValue: Those who have succeeded at anything and don't mention luck are kidding themselves

Quote.QuoteValue: Everything starts as somebody's daydream

Quote.Author: Larry Wilmore

Quote.Author: Laura Linney
Quote.QuoteValue: A magnetic personality doesn't necessarily indicate a good heart

Quote.QuoteValue: I am so like Donna it's funny. And most of my friends are guys too

Quote.QuoteValue: What happens in Vegas may stay in Vegas, but what happens in New Orleans, goes home with you

Quote.QuoteValue: A woman isn't complete without a man. But where do you find a man - a real man - these days?

Quote.Author: Lauren Graham

Quote.Author: Lauryn Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality is easy. It's deception that's the hard work

Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not as beautiful as a model

Quote.QuoteValue: In my deepest parts of sadness, I'm always making a joke or being sarcastic

Quote.QuoteValue: I have a kind of old-fashioned, artisan approach

Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to sell my soul to Hollywood - to just make run-of-the-mill stuff

Quote.QuoteValue: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family

Quote.QuoteValue: Do you ever achieve total forgiveness after screwing up?

Quote.QuoteValue: Be open to the amazing changes which are occurring in the field that interest you

Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been crazy. I'm a very good girl, to be honest. I don't do anything to hurt anybody

Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I start feeling sexy I trip

Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think you should feel guilty about pleasure. Defeats the purpose

Quote.QuoteValue: Music is my life, it is a reflection of what I go through

Quote.Author: Leo Burnett
Quote.QuoteValue: What helps people, helps business

Quote.Author: Leon Trotsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Old age is the most unexpected of all things that happen to a man

Quote.Author: Leona Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very sensitive and I'm quite a soft person, and I cry a lot when things upset me

Quote.QuoteValue: There is a crack in everything, that's how the light gets in

Quote.Author: Leonardo DiCaprio
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the kind of person who tries to be cool or trendy, I'm definitely an individual

Quote.Author: Les Dawson
Quote.QuoteValue: The way prices are rising, the good old days are last week

Quote.QuoteValue: When you look back, I think things are as they are meant to be. Timing is very important

Quote.QuoteValue: I fly my geek flag proudly. Absolutely

Quote.QuoteValue: Good times don't last long sometimes

Quote.QuoteValue: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you

Quote.Author: Lewis Black
Quote.QuoteValue: I like coffee because it gives me the illusion that I might be awake

Quote.Author: Lewis Howes
Quote.QuoteValue: Effective networking isn't a result of luck - it requires hard work and persistence

Quote.Author: Lewis Mumford

Quote.QuoteValue: It was a big decision to leave the system because many people said I would fail

Quote.QuoteValue: I don't generally hang out with crazy people

Quote.Author: Liam Neeson

Quote.QuoteValue: If you fall in love with somebody you're working with, fine, but wait till your project is over

Quote.QuoteValue: You need a really solid foundation of friends and family to keep you where you need to be

Quote.QuoteValue: The first Disney movie I saw I think was 'Snow White.' I loved all the Disney princess movies

Quote.Author: Lily Tomlin

Quote.Author: Li
Quote.QuoteValue: anuel Miranda - History is so subjective. The teller of it determines it

Quote.Author: Linda Evangelista
Quote.QuoteValue: It was God who made me so beautiful. If I weren't, then I'd be a teacher

Quote.Author: Lindsey Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: If 'Obama-care' becomes fully implemented in 2014, it's going to bankrupt states

Quote.Author: Lindsey Vonn
Quote.QuoteValue: It's amazing. Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it

Quote.QuoteValue: If Microsoft ever does applications for Linux it means I've won

Quote.QuoteValue: You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it

Quote.Author: Lionel Richie
Quote.QuoteValue: People, as critical as it looks, we're OK. We are in control, whether we feel it or not

Quote.Author: Liz Phair
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know; it just seemed like the cooler guys are playing Xbox. At least the ones I know

Quote.QuoteValue: Anything is possible in this world. I really believe that

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynch

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been around a long time, and life still has a whole lot of surprises for me

Quote.QuoteValue: There's a bit of magic in everything, and some loss to even things out

Quote.QuoteValue: Musicians don't retire; they stop when there's no more music in them

Quote.QuoteValue: There are no shortcuts in evolution
